Header: Travel advisory relaxed by key European tourist markets
Content: Colombo (News 1st): Many European countries have relaxed the advisory on Sri Lankan travel. These include the Netherlands, Germany, Italy, Switzerland, and Austria. Following 04/21 attacks, a number of countries including Britain issued travel warnings regarding Sri Lanka to their citizens. However, countries including the Netherlands have relaxed their travel warnings with Sri Lankaâ€™s situation turning back to normal. According to the foreign media, these countries have relaxed their warnings requesting tourists to be vigilant at all times.
